backpack.config.title: Diversity's Configs
backpack.config.undo.tooltip: Revert all options to their pre-edit state.
backpack.config.cancel.tooltip: Exit Config Screen without saving any changes.
backpack.config.reset.tooltip: Reset all options to their default, can be undo.
backpack.config._enable_cloud-sync.toolt:
- Enable/Disable Sync feature.
- Enable this will upload your backpack data to API server. And everyone can see the type and variant of your backpack.
backpack.config.hide_if_invisible.toolti: - Should backpack render on invisible player or not.
backpack.config.hide_items_component_dat:
- Server side only.
- Should the server hide item data before sending it to the client?

backpack.system.upload.syncing: Uploading bacpack data to public API...
backpack.customize.online_status.error: Sync service not available, server you're connected to is in offline mode or you aren't currently logged into a valid Minecraft account
